item.title: Fantasy Maiden Wars - DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER -
item.description:
Title: Fantasy Maiden Wars - DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER -
Genre: Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: さんぼん堂
Publisher: Phoenixx Inc.
Release Date: Oct 20, 2025




About This Game

Fantasy Maiden Wars is a classic tactical RPG with a diverse cast of iconic Touhou Project heroines. Explore the expansive world of Gensokyo, a fantastical realm where humans, yokai, and gods exist side-by-side. Seek out the source of supernational incidents disturbing the peace across the land.

Deploy your units across grid-based maps, take down enemies with strategic positioning and turn-based tactics, and clear stages to progress the story.

Multiple difficulty levels and a full-featured tutorial system make this a perfect entry point for players new to the genre—while offering plenty of depth for veterans.

Engage in beautifully animated battles whenever characters clash. From sword slashes and gunfire to devastating Spell Card finishers, every attack is brought to life with flair.

Watch your favorite characters unleash flashy moves in the rich, vibrant world of Gensokyo.

Customize your squad between missions in the Intermission screen—equip gear, assign skills, and build the dream team your way.

Each character has unique traits and signature abilities, opening the door to countless team compositions and strategies. Go all-in on your favorites or hunt down the most broken combos—how you play is up to you.

Choose between shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei or magician Marisa Kirisame as your protagonist—your choice will impact parts of the story.

The game weaves together reinterpretations of storylines from across the Touhou Project series, uniting them into a single, epic narrative arc for both newcomers and longtime fans.

Beyond the gameplay, enjoy a rich selection of bonus content:

  • A detailed character and terminology encyclopedia that introduces the world of Touhou

  • A massive music room with over 200 tracks from the game

Perfect for both Touhou veterans and those just beginning their journey into Gensokyo.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU @ 3.40GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: NINJA GAIDEN 4
item.description:
Title: NINJA GAIDEN 4
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: PlatinumGames Inc. / Team NINJA / KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
Publisher: Xbox Game Studios
Release Date: Oct 20, 2025




About This Game

The definitive ninja hack & slash franchise returns with NINJA GAIDEN 4! Embark on a cutting-edge adventure where legacy meets innovation in this high-octane blend of style and no-holds-barred combat.

Return of the Legend

Experience a return to the intense, high-speed combat that established NINJA GAIDEN as a premier action game series. Prepare for a legacy reborn with captivating style for a new generation of players.

Epic Hack and Slash Combat, Evolved

NINJA GAIDEN 4 fuses Team NINJA’s tempered combat philosophy with the stylish, dynamic action gameplay of PlatinumGames. Engage in visually stunning combat that rewards precision and strategy. Use Bloodbind Ninjutsu to transform your weapons and unleash devastation upon your enemies, alongside legacy techniques like the Izuna Drop and Flying Swallow. The legendary

Ryu Hayabusa also returns with a revamped yet familiar set of tools to master. With a customizable player experience, NINJA GAIDEN 4 will push action game veterans to their limits while allowing newcomers to enjoy a heart-pounding adventure full of twists and turns.

An Ancient Enemy Returns

An endless rain of miasma hangs over a near-future Tokyo in the wake of an ancient enemy’s resurrection. The fate of the city lies in the hands of young ninja prodigy, Yakumo. Fighting his way through cybernetic ninja soldiers and otherworldly creatures, Yakumo must reconcile a destiny he shares with the legendary Ryu Hayabusa himself and free Tokyo from the ancient curse that brought the city to its knees.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language, Suggestive Themes



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows® 10/11, 64bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 3400G
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (VRAM 6GB) or ​ AMD Radeon™ RX 590(VRAM 8GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 100 GB available space
    • Sound Card: 16bit 48kHz ステレオ
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required. ​ 1080p / 30FPS​ FSR quality "Low"​ Object Quality "Low"
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows® 10/11, 64bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060 Super(VRAM 8GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700XT(VRAM 8GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 100 GB available space
    • Sound Card: 16bit 48kHz ステレオ
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required. ​ 1080p / 60FPS ​ FSR Quality "Middle"​ Object Quality "Middle"

item.title: Gamestonk Simulator: Gone Rogue
item.description:
Title: Gamestonk Simulator: Gone Rogue
Genre: Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: simsum
Publisher: simsum , Vsoo Games
Franchise: Top Simulator Games
Release Date: Oct 20, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Oct 20, 2025




About This Game

🎮 The Last Stand of Physical Games

Gamestonk is the first roguelite shop simulator , blending management, strategy, and chaos into one pixel-packed package. Each day presents new challenges, new customers, and new opportunities to survive—or fail spectacularly. Adapt to the ever-changing market, or get crushed by it.

You’ve just inherited your grandfather’s dusty, chaotic video game shop—the last one standing in a world dominated by faceless online megacorps. Can you turn this retro wreck into a thriving business before the digital tide wipes you out?

📈 Endless Mode: Build Without Limits

If you’d rather build the ultimate gaming empire without the pressure of permadeath, switch to Endless Mode . In this laid-back tycoon experience, there’s no game over—just pure shop management bliss. Expand at your own pace, hire your dream team, and chase profits without limits.

📼 Retros Are Forever

Discover and collect a massive library of retro games—each with unique traits, rarities, and collector-grade properties. From humble plastic cartridges to ultra-rare Galactic editions, every retro title you find could change the course of your shop. Look out for sealed copies, complete-in-box treasures, signed editions, and imports straight from Japan—just like the real-world grading fantasy. And best of all? Retros never reset. No matter how your run ends, your retro collection stays with you, growing stronger with every playthrough. Build the ultimate archive and flex your shelves with pride— because retros are forever.

📅 Plan Your Week

Start each day by checking your trusty calendar for what's ahead. Whether it’s a new game release, a fresh gaming system, or a new type of furniture, staying informed is key. Watch out for special events; hot releases bring in excited customers, while certain days might attract more troublemakers. A well-prepared shop owner always stays ahead!

🃏 Select Modifiers Strategically

Every morning, The Truck arrives with offers: bonuses for some genres, discounts for others, store rating accelerations, loot amplification, and many others. Anticipate your needs wisely and purchase them strategically.

📦 Buy Games and Hardware

Order a massive collection of goodies—new game licenses, consoles, and peripherals. Once you’ve unlocked the latest stock, head to your PC, browse your catalogue, and order what you need to keep your store fully stocked for the day.

📚 Stock the Shelves

With fresh inventory and shelves ready at your store’s door, it’s time to get everything in place! Organize your shelves efficiently before opening and restock throughout the day to keep up with demand. A well-stocked store means happy customers!

💵 Run the Register

It’s time for the Grand Opening! Customers will rush in to grab their favourite games—scan their items, process their payments, and keep the line moving. But don’t keep them waiting too long! Impatient shoppers will walk out empty-handed if you fail to check them out in time.

🧍‍♂️ Hire the Crew, Run the Show

Running a store solo is risky business—thankfully, you can hire a team to keep things running while you focus on the big picture. Bring on cashiers to handle extra checkouts, stockers to pick up the mess, and bouncers to deal with rowdy customers and sticky-fingered shoplifters. But managing people is its own game: pay salaries on time, keep morale high, and watch their performance soar—or ignore them and watch your dream store spiral into chaos. Each staff member has their own stats, quirks, and work ethic. Treat them right, and they'll keep your legacy alive.

🪓 Defend Your Store

Not everyone is here to shop. Some shady characters are eyeing your stock, and it’s up to you to stop them before they make off with your best-selling items. Equip yourself with your new favourite tool: The Bat , and protect your store from losses!

🏗️ Expand and Grow

As your business grows, so does your store! Expand to fit more shelves, attract more customers, and reorganize your layout to maximize efficiency. Show off your management skills and prove you can run the biggest, best game store in town!

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space

item.title: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
item.description:
Title: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
Genre: Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Rockbee Team
Publisher: Polden Publishing
Release Date: Oct 20, 2025




About This Game

Lessaria is the spiritual successor to Majesty

We're bringing back the RTS genre with indirect control. You build a kingdom, hire heroes, and they live their own lives, doing whatever they please. Try winning a battle with such an unpredictable army!

New ideas

We're not creating a clone — we're evolving the game as if we're making the third part of the series. Brand-new combat system. Hero squads. We're adding many fresh ideas to the genre.

Engaging gameplay

Even if you've never played Majesty, you'll love how captivating the gameplay is! You'll be watching this world come to life, and it's hard not to get drawn in.

Co-development with players

We regularly conduct playtests, gather feedback, and implement exciting ideas. This makes the game even more engaging and full of interesting features.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

    Minimum:

    • OS: 7,8,10,11

    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1060
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 14 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: 7,8,10,11
    • Processor: Intel core i5
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1080
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 14 GB available space

item.title: Touhou Dystopian
item.description:
Title: Touhou Dystopian
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: Kay Lnk
Publisher: Kay Lnk
Release Date: Oct 17, 2025




About This Game

This is a third-person action roguelite game. Players will play one of several protagonists to challenge powerful enemies in the Animal Realm and solve the source of the incident.

The game will include 4 protagonists with different fighting styles to unlock, 9 boss battles based on various Touhou characters, and nearly 100 kinds of enhanced abilities.

●EXCITING BATTLE

In terms of combat, the operation is simplified, while the operation threshold is minimized as much as possible, while retaining the tension and excitement brought by action games.

Clear all obstacles with flawless skill!

●RICH TALENT ENHANCEMENT

During the process, each protagonist has a unique enhancement ability to choose from, and some powerful enhancement abilities will directly change the character's fighting style.

Face all challenges with the strongest attitude!

●HIGHLY ANTICIPATED CHARACTERS

As the Primate Spirit Garden is restored, it will attract visitors of all kinds.

Players will meet visitors of different characteristics in the game and get their help.

Let’s liven up the Primate Spirit Garden!

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

In some of the larger movements, you may see some characters' underwear under their skirts.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 or newer
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX580
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 or newer
    • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
